title: 36. The Inside-Out Approach to Hormonal Acne, Branding Yourself on Social Media + Turning Pain to Passion with The Self Care Nurse, Care Clark.
description:
In this episode of The Treatment Room, Tess is joined by acne specialist, and content creator/ influencer, Care Clark, better known as The Self Care Nurse. 

 We discuss:

- types of acne

- hormonal acne

- when an RX may be helpful/ necessary

- your experience with acne if you'd like to touch on it!

- the role birth control can play with acne, how to choose a safe one, and tips for those getting off BC who have concerns about managing their acne

- diet and acne

- endocrine disruptors

- stress and acne

- how to brand yourself on social media

- winning on TikTok


Care's website

Care's Instagram
